author: Phantron

text: Its just an hd rerelease of the remake and the remake was exclusive for nintendo it was only on the gamecube and wii this is the first time its ported for other consoles other than nintendo's so i dont understand why alot of pepole are hating capcom for this im happy that alot of pepole will get to play this masterpiece of a game alot of pepole never played the remake and even thought i played it before im gonna buy it again been a long time since i played and to support the game of course.
author: BadAssMacmillan

text: This track by far for me is one of my all time vg music favorites. There is a bit of a calming presence to the music when it plays (mostly because you've been walking around with mostly silence the entire game), but also has a feel of disturbing mystery that you're just about to unearth.
author: Locke664

text: El mejor Resident Evil de todos con un soundtrack perfecto y terrorífico.
author: Alex Wright

text: Now I'm gonna get nightmares :( I can't wait to get this in a higher resolution :)
author: Gay Vulture

text: This game would be perfect if it also had the infamous voice acting RE1 had.
author: Owari Dragon

text: The best Resident Evil of all time!
author: Musashi 7000

text: My favorite Resident Evil and remake ever, this is almost the textbook perfect horror game. I enjoyed the original version on the PS1, but this flawless remake is simply better in every way. Still today, the graphics are superb and exploring the meticulously designed mansion is always a (terrifying) joy. The first encounter with a crimson head was especially memorable.
author: SupraDarky

text: Not to mention the voice acting in the Gamecube version is miles better than the PS1 version.
author: Medal Melodies

text: Along with Silent Hill 2, this game remains to be one of the most iconic horror games of all time.
author: remotefreak147

text: My favorite Resident Evil. The music is so good. I listen to daily. Make the nights very eerie. It really gets you into the spirit of Halloween.

text:
